objects.text:
✓ Water Resistant
✓ 14 Pockets & 3 Compartments
✓ Fits Up To 16" Laptop
✓ Padded Shoulder Straps

product_details.description:
• Crafted with reverse coated polyester and microfibre. 
  • Water resistant. 
  • 14 pockets. 3 compartments. Designed to organise your work days and staycations. 
  • Front compartment comes with a retractable key holder, large slip pockets, pen pockets and a zippered pocket. 
  • Main compartment opens flat, to give you full access to your items. 
  • Comes with a spill-proof pocket for your toiletries. 
  • Elastic slip pockets along the walls of your backpack. 
  • Zippered mesh storage compartment makes room for your weekend staycation. 
  • Comes with an expansion system, which you can unzip to get an additional 8L of packing space. 
  • Shock-proof tech compartment that opens flat and protects your tech from those accidental drops. Fits up to a 16” laptop and an 11” iPad Pro. 
  • Contoured bottle pocket on the side for your water bottle/umbrella.
  • Quick access zippered pocket at the top. 
  • Hidden passport pocket at the back. 
  • Padded shoulder straps designed for all day comfort. 
  • Luggage sleeve that secures to any Mokobara luggage. 
  • Dedicated rain cover compartment at the bottom. Use the rain cover to protect your Mokobara from the rains.
  • Size - 44 x 29 x 23 cm

banner_details:
The banner features a modern and dynamic layout promoting a premium backpack. A bold **heading** (`heading`) at the top left uses a tech-style sans-serif font in bright yellow to attract attention. Directly beneath it, the **subheading** (`subheading`) stands out in large white text, defining the backpack's capacity. A concise **description** (`description`) follows, listing key product features with bullet points for clarity and appeal.

The **price** (`price`) is prominently displayed in large white numerals near the bottom-left section. Adjacent to this, a bright yellow **call-to-action button** (`cta_background` and `cta`) labeled "SHOP NOW" prompts user interaction.

On the right, the **product image** (`product_image`) is clearly presented against an angular and layered geometric background (`background`) consisting of diagonal divisions in deep blues and subtle gold accents. Two golden circles, styled for decoration, add balance and visual interest.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Blue (#2C3E50)
- Navy Blue (#1F3A63)
- Steel Blue (#34495E)
- Bright Yellow (#FFD700)
- Light Grey (#E5E9F0)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image showcases a modern and sleek backpack with a dominant deep navy blue color (#2B3A57), exuding professionalism and elegance. A matte black accent (#1C1C1C) is used subtly in the branding tag and zippers, adding contrast without overpowering. The oversized dark grey print (#3A3F47) on the front panel provides a minimalist yet strong identity, blending smoothly with the navy base. A pop of mustard yellow (#F2B705) highlights the handle and inner lining edge, drawing attention and providing a stylish vibrance. These colors are harmoniously blended, achieving both subdued sophistication and visual appeal, ideal for a premium advertisement banner.
